attributes.action: ensure the olympic games 2012 has a logo and brand that the UK can be proud of
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The logo for the 2012 Olympic games is a massive disappointment in every opinion poll. It is important to create a brand and image that the UK people (and other nations) find readable, creative and attractive.

The £400,000 spent on the current design is wasteful and will turn even more people off the games. It glorifies graffiti, it is difficult to read, it looks like a mess, a half effort.

This is not an abstract art competition, we need something to be proud of, something to get behind.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
